name: Development
info: The Dev event consists of two categories: Web Development and App Development. The prompt will be the same for both and participants can choose to submit their entries in either of the two or both.

name: Design
info: The Design consists of three categories: 3D Design, Graphic Design, and UI Design. There will be separate prompts for each category; participants can take part in one or more categories.

name: Audio/Video Editing
info: A/V Editing is a very diverse field; films, motion graphics, animations, and videos, all come under A/V. Based on the prompt, you can choose to make a video of any type from the above.

name: Encryptid
info: Tech Syndicate's annual cryptic hunt, a scavenger hunt-like experience, based on web security, cryptography, and steganography.

name: Crossword
info: A tech-based crossword solely based on puns. The only things that you need to know are the name's of really popular tech companies, products, or games.

name: Group Discussion
info: An engaging panel discussion debating the rights and wrongs of the latest technology trends/issues. It consists of a group of individuals having an intellectual discussion.
